_source.text: After a fun filled day at the Disney theme parks or on the golf course, what would be better than a swim in the southeast facing swimming pool and soaked in the spa, or relaxing in the lounger from the huge balcony overlooking the tennis court and open space right in the backyard.

text: After a fun filled day at the Disney theme parks or on the **golf** course, what would be **better** **than** a
the huge balcony overlooking the **tennis** court and open space right in the backyard.

_source.text: 2. More disc golf is better than less disc golf so why the hell not.

text: 2. More **disc** **golf** **is** **better** **than** less **disc** **golf** so why the hell not.

_source.text: A bad day at disc golf is still better than a good day at anything else.... Unless its also disc golf

text: A bad day at **disc** **golf** is still **better** **than** a good day at anything else.... Unless its also **disc** **golf**

_source.text: After all, what could be better than being out at Cass Benton for several hours of fresh air, sunshine, and disc golf?

text: After all, what could be **better** **than** being out at Cass Benton for several hours of fresh air, sunshine, and **disc** **golf**?
